name: Shadow Chaser
effects: One single attack (4.00~7.00 scaling with current HP%) capped at 99999, heals the user for 20% of the damage dealt at Gloomshade levels 1 and 2 and causes -1 Gloomshade to the user, 100% hit rate
effectsNote:
The multiplier for this attack is given by the following formula, where X is the current %HP of the user:

min(exp(-1 * (X - 1) * 600 / 10000) * 300 + 400, 700) / 100

The minimum multiplier is 4.00, and never goes higher than 7.00.

effects: One group attack (0.40~0.90 scaling with targets)
effectsNote:
The multiplier per hit for this ability decreases as the number of enemies increases. The exact number is given by the following formula, where X is the number of alive enemies:

0.40+(0.90-0.40)*exp(-(X-1)*0.35)

This multiplier starts at 0.90 with only 1 enemy and is always higher than 0.40.
